title: From Knowledge Generation to Knowledge Verification Examining the BioMedical Generative Capabilities.pdf
abstract: • Verifying the correctness of biomedical named entity terms (about diseases, drugs, symptoms, and genetics) through the use of corresponding specialized biomedical on- tologies. • Verifying the reliability of generating structured associations that are deeply rooted in biomedical literature (PubMed). • Verifying the consistency of LLMs in identifying its own generated associations within simulated biomedical abstracts produced by various ChatGPT models. arXiv:2502.14714v1 [cs.AI] 20 Feb 2025
